name: Alien Holiday - The Junkyard Demo
description:
ALIENS HAVE INVADED YOUR CITY!

  But that doesn't matter right now, a member of the cat gang just stole your phone and you'll invade their hideout in the junkyard to settle this WITH YOUR FISTS!!!

FEATURES:

- Turn based combat with a small twist. In between turns: stay alert!

- Around 30min of gameplay, play it during your lunchtime, just try not to drop spaghetti on your keyboard.

- Cheap Beer, salted cashew nuts.

- The funniest jokes of the year! (at least according to my mom)

- Gangster cats

- And these guys:

  Alien Holiday is an upcoming RPG about a group of misfits trying to stop a citywide neverending party, this demo encompasses the game's first dungeon and tries to give a taste of the story and vibes found in the full release.

 If you liked the game after playing consider leaving a comment and a review! Also, follow the twitter profile for news!

CREDITS:

- Bruno Nascimento: Art / Script / Gameplay

- Daniel Teles: Music

Made in RPGMaker MV
